item.title: OKX will delist margin trading pairs such as CATI/USDT, NMR/USDT.
item.description: August 21st. According to an official announcement, OKX has declared the removal of leverage trading and spot margin trading services for CATI/USDT, NMR/USDT, ICX/USDT, DGB/USDT, MEME/USDT, JST/USDT, and RVN/USDT.

item.title: A new address sold $1.5 million worth of ETH and then went long on ETH with 20x leverage.
item.description: On August 21st. Based on the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet address sold 355.97 ETH and exchanged it for 1.5 million USDC. Then, this user went long on an ETH position with a leverage of 20x and deposited the obtained funds into Hyperliquid.

item.title: S&P 500 Index Futures Extend Losses, Hit New Intraday Low
item.description: On August 21st, based on market data, S&P 500 Index futures saw their losses expand and hit a new intraday low. (Golden Finance)

item.title: Gemini Obtains MiCA License in Malta
item.description: On August 21st, as per Cointelegraph, the cryptocurrency exchange Gemini has secured Malta's Crypto-Asset Market Integrity (MiCA) license to facilitate the company's ongoing expansion within Europe.

item.title: 30 million YZY tokens will be injected into the main liquidity pool, and will be gradually sold in the price range of $3.1716 to $4.4929.
item.description: August 21st. Based on LookOnChain's monitoring, the Kanye West Meme Coin YZY project added 30 million YZY to the liquidity pool (approximately $34 million), with a price range of $3.1716 to $4.4929.This indicates that once the price goes beyond $3.1716, the project team will begin to earn fees and gradually sell YZY for USDC.If the price rises to above $4.4929, all 30 million YZY will be sold.

item.title: Upbit Trading Volume Shrinks Again: ETH, XRP, API3 Currently Top Three
item.description: On August 21st, based on CoinGecko data, in the past 24 hours, Upbit's trading volume decreased to $2.345 billion. The ETH/KRW trading pair accounted for 17.98% of the volume and ranked first in the South Korean won market. The remaining top five in terms of trading volume are: XRP, API3, BTC, LINK.

item.title: Huobi HTX has launched YZY perpetual contract trading and initiated the Contract Trading Party.
item.description: August 21st. According to an official announcement, Huobi HTX launched the YZY/USDT perpetual contract trading pair with up to 20x leverage on August 21st. In addition, Huobi HTX started the YZY contract trading party from 18:00 on August 21st to 18:00 on August 28th (UTC+8), with a total prize pool of up to $10,000.During the event, users who sign up and participate in YZY/USDT contract trading with a cumulative effective trading volume â‰¥$10,000 USDT will share the prize pool based on their trading volume ranking. New users trading the YZY/USDT contract will also receive exclusive benefits.

item.title: Bitget has launched the U-based YZY perpetual contract, with leverage ranging from 1 to 20x.
item.description: On August 21, as per an official announcement, Bitget has declared the launch of the U-based YZY perpetual contract. The leverage offered ranges from 1 to 20x. Additionally, the contract trading BOT will be made available simultaneously.

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: Hedge Fund Short Position Increases to $4.19 Billion, Ethereum Price May Continue to Face Downward Pressure
item.description: On August 21st, a BiyaPay analyst pointed out that the recent Ethereum price failed to break through a crucial resistance level, resulting in another round of market downturn. The bearish pressure in this round of the market is mainly driven by large hedge funds. These funds have been increasing their Ethereum short positions and attempting to trigger stop-losses by pushing down the ETH price. According to The Block's "CME Ether Futures Net Position" data, the current number of Ethereum shorts has reached an unprecedented level, indicating a strong market expectation for a further decline in the Ethereum price.Especially in August, hedge funds' Ethereum short positions nearly doubled, rising from $2.3 billion on August 5th to $4.19 billion. This change indicates that institutional investors continue to bet on the Ethereum price maintaining a downward trend. In the current market environment, the increase in short positions is one of the main factors putting pressure on the Ethereum p

item.title: Justin Sun: Tron will adjust network transaction fees based on the market to stay competitive
item.description: On August 21st, Justin Sun announced on social media that Tron super representatives are fully cognizant that as the price of TRX surges during a bull market, the network transaction fees are continuously on the rise. The Tron community will adjust the network fees in accordance with the actual situation to ensure the competitiveness of the Tron network.
